metadata.description: To mark 10 glorious year of Assassin's Creed, Titan Comics are bringing together the franchise's best-loved characters for a celebratory series like no other! Get ready for four brand new adventures starring fan favorite Assassins like Edward Kenway and Altair, along with the series' celebrated Renaissance roof-crawler, Ezio Auditore de Firenze!
metadata.name: Assassin's Creed: Reflections
